I see you also did overtime hours this weekend, really appreciate your efforts! Getting so close.

Cheers,

Hi Rebecca,

I hope you are doing well.

We have made updates to the site regarding the pills. If you check the backend you will have the idea on how it was built :)

full_threads.body:
This ticket has been open for over 5 days. If action is still required, please prioritize it. Otherwise, kindly provide an update and confirm it can be closed.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough:
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5
  • https://www.loom.com/share/b1f338d04eb44b118d915b107a6ed087?sid=1dbc4938-b676-4cd2-a748-5692874039dc
@joel + @cindy - please limit scope on this and push back to do things after go live as much as possible.

Amazing thank you! If we need to go live without these pills, or leave them off altogether I've let Ina know that's a possibility.

If you could also have a look at the equipment and tech archive page, that would be amazing as we may go live with that page as well.

Thanks for all your help, it is much appreciated!

Rebecca Broom

Senior Graphic Designer

M 0466 668 276

Hi Rebecca,

I wanted to send you a quick update.

We are still working on this and will share an update on Monday.

Have a good weekend ahead.

This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

Hi Joel, I think so, I've been working with some ACF relationship fields within repeaters so it's possible something is misfiring when a field is empty? It's to add the services link inside the accordions in here https://stg-royalrehablifeworksnew-july23.kinsta.cloud/?breakdance=builder&id=7607

Let me know if you're able to pinpoint which template or field might be triggering it if not that one, I can jump in and check or add fallback conditions if needed? Let me know!

Appreciate you looking into it.

Cheers,

Rebecca
